languages.text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of perplexed.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict staggered.

Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

languages.text:
每当装备者使用重型武器对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会使目标获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
如果目标至少拥有3层“困惑”效果，装备者的攻击还会使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者使用重型武器对敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会使目标获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果。
如果目标至少拥有3层“困惑”效果，装备者的攻击还会使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text:
Когда персонаж наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} тяжелым оружием, цель получает +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}.
Если на цели уже есть 3 или более уровней замешательства, то атаки персонажа также наносят {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж наносит урон тяжелым оружием, цель получает +1 уровень замешательства.
Если на цели уже есть 3 или более уровней замешательства, то атаки персонажа также наносят ошеломление.

Когда персонаж наносит урон тяжелым оружием, цель получает +1 уровень замешательства.
Если на цели уже есть 3 или более уровней замешательства, то атаки персонажа также наносят ошеломление.

languages.text:
使用者がヘヴィウェポンで敵に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}状態のスタックを+1受ける。
ターゲットに混乱状態のスタックがすでに3以上ある場合、使用者の攻撃でさらに{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}が2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}付与される。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者がヘビーな武器で敵にダメージを与えるたび、その敵は{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}状態のスタックが1増える。
ターゲットに混乱状態のスタックがすでに3以上ある場合、使用者の攻撃でさらに{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}が付与される。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a un enemigo con un arma pesada, el enemigo sufre +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
Si el objetivo ya tiene 3 o más acumulaciones de perplejo, los ataques del portador también infligen {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador cause daño a un enemigo con un arma pesada, el enemigo sufre +1 acumulación de {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}.
Si el objetivo ya tiene 3 o más acumulaciones de perplejo, los ataques del portador también infligen {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.

languages.text:
Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit einer schweren Waffe bei einem Feind verursacht, erleidet dieser Feind +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.
Hat das Ziel bereits 3 oder mehr Stapel "Überrascht", bewirken die Angriffe des Trägers 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang auch {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der Träger Schaden mit einer schweren Waffe bei einem Feind verursacht, erleidet dieser Feind +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}.
Hat das Ziel bereits 3 oder mehr Stapel Überrascht, verursachen die Angriffe des Trägers auch {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.

languages.text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à un ennemi à l'aide d'une arme lourde, cet ennemi subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
Si la cible possède déjà au moins 3 cumuls de l'effet Perplexité, les attaques de l'utilisateur lui infligent également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi à l'aide d'une arme lourde, cet ennemi subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
Si la cible possède déjà au moins 3 cumuls de l'effet Perplexité, les attaques de l'utilisateur lui infligent également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts à un ennemi à l'aide d'une arme lourde, cet ennemi subit +1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}.
Si la cible possède déjà au moins 3 cumuls de l'effet Perplexité, les attaques de l'utilisateur lui infligent également l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, bir düşmana ağır bir silahla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verdiğinde o düşman, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalır.
Hedef üzerinde zaten 3 veya daha fazla şaşkınlık birikimi varsa giyen kişinin saldırıları ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallamaya{/g} sebep olur. Bu etki, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with a heavy weapon to an enemy, that enemy suffers +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}.
If 3 or more stacks of perplexed are already on the target, the wearer's attacks also inflict {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
